participant_1.background:
I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music.
i give lessons on string instruments.
I don't want to talk about my parents.
I read horror novels in secret so my parents don't worry about me.
My favorite vacation was when my wife and I went to the Galapagos Islands.

participant_2.background:
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
i have started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
i hate paying my bills.

content.text: I'm a musician and I love playing the guitar.
That's cool! I love playing the drums.
I also teach lessons to students on how to play the guitar.
That's an awesome job! I'm trying to get into creating my own comics.
That's awesome! I hope you get to publish them.
Thanks! I'm also working on getting healthier and losing weight.
That's great! I'm happy for you.
Thanks! I'm just trying to be happier and more productive.
That's great! I'm always trying to be a better person.
Me too! I think we're going to do great things.
I agree! We should keep in touch and see how we're doing in the future.
Definitely! I'd love to stay connected.
